title: Makisha99
author: Makisha99

content: Bounty link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5441648.0Payments cheating: CWM all management team payments cheating with to maximum bounty hunters.CWM team has changed my wallet address and taken my rewards. I worked for 16 long weeks but didn't get paid. The initial spreadsheet had kept the name, but the final spreadsheet with no name. 90% tokens are killed by CWM management. The final spreadsheet has been checked from one to ten. One wallet address does not match the bounty authentication link. Final spreadsheet pictures first page link:http://ibn.im/MmEl4utTelegram username: https://t.me/Jamescarlos_zCrypto world channel link:https://t.me/cryptoworld_managmentCWM Founder:https://t.me/cryptoworldmanagmentBitcointalk Profile Link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3479982https://twitter.com/AsanVerseSee the many complaint Asanverse Telegram groups:https://t.me/ASANTokenAsanverse - 4 round final spreadsheet link:https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1swVEkmEgU5GAebN_odNUSthoEywz9iro4To0RXVaPEQ/edit?usp=sharingMy personal information:Actual Tw Spreadsheet pictures link:http://ibn.im/mfV1HZAActual complaint Tw spreadsheet pictures link:http://ibn.im/RB4AiIFAfter changed wallet address:Present Tw Spreadsheet pictures link:http://ibn.im/tJyKHXjPresent Final Spreadsheet pictures:http://ibn.im/25VPHZCCoinmarketcap voted link:http://ibn.im/GavFT2ZChanged spreadsheet wallet:Final spreadsheet no: 142Twitter new spreadsheet:94Previous spreadsheet wallet Twitter ¬†spreadsheet No:90Please verify it and ¬†take proper step as soon as possible. Maybe many bounty hunters has lost, because payment cheating. Thanks

comments.author: Shobhikhan_007
comments.body: I worked 16 weeks completely. stakes are also updated correctly and when he posted final reward spreadsheet I have 35$ as reward. Then after couple of hours my reward was reduced to 25$ and also added red mark. I asked what did I do? because I posted every work correctly and also I submitted screenshots of coinmarketcap, coingecko task also. Then manager replied also that I was done and eligible for reward. Once I asked what happened and send the proofs of all my work and screenshot submitted he stopped replying me and banned me from his bounty group. In project telegram also we can't tell anything he take admin and delete all our messages. I usually don't follow this kind of thing and complain but since more than 50+ people were cheated and also I have same situation with his previous bounty Oscarswap and evo. He always changed wallet and ineligible people without no reason after the bounty end. Since people silenced he take advantages always by misleading and wasting people time. It's time to raise the voice and make right action for what he doing continuously. I'm requesting please take necessary action for this bounty manager. I don't need reward but I would like if someone can take action against this cheater.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: As information for participants who feel aggrieved, your manager has been banned. https://bpip.org/Profile?id=3479982Unfortunately, he won't come to clarify anything on your claim and this prevents you from getting your rights. At least he won't be managing any bounties in the future, unless he secretly creates a new account under a different management name. So, prepare your sharp eyes to recognize the signs.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Quote from: rat03gopoh on June 27, 2023, 03:27:29 PMAs information for participants who feel aggrieved, your manager has been banned. https://bpip.org/Profile?id=3479982Unfortunately, he won't come to clarify anything on your claim and this prevents you from getting your rights. At least he won't be managing any bounties in the future, unless he secretly creates a new account under a different management name. So, prepare your sharp eyes to recognize the signs.It is good that the cheater has been banned, but of course this will not solve the problem because the participants will not get their rewards, but the forum administration cannot do more than ban.Also this cheater will surely come back to the forum with another account so bounty hunters should be careful and double check any bounty campaign before subscribing. It is better for them not to participate if the campaign manager is not a trusted member or there is a guarantee for the campaign.This is not the first incident and it will not be the last. Bounty hunters do not tire themselves with research and participate in any campaign, so they always fall into the trap.
